pageSetting.title: 行员风险金汇总查询

sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select substr(cast(fxjhz.tjrq as char(8)),1,6) as tjrq,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,hy.hydh,hy.hymc, fxjhz.yjtfxj,fxjhz.yfhfxj,fxjhz.dfhfxj,fxjhz.dyyfhfxj from dkjx_dkfxjhz fxjhz inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = fxjhz.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy on jgcy.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and $tjrq_ym$ between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = jgcy.jgkhdxdh inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QXHY($tjrq_ym$,$login_khdxdh$,0)) qxhy on hy.khdxdh=qxhy.khdxdh where hy.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and fxjhz.tjrq = $tjrq_ym$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( select substr(cast(fxjhz.tjrq as char(8)),1,6) as tjrq,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,hy.hydh,hy.hymc, fxjhz.yjtfxj,fxjhz.yfhfxj,fxjhz.dfhfxj,fxjhz.dyyfhfxj from dkjx_dkfxjhz fxjhz inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = fxjhz.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy on jgcy.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and $tjrq_ym$ between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = jgcy.jgkhdxdh inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QXHY($tjrq_ym$,$login_khdxdh$,0)) qxhy on hy.khdxdh=qxhy.khdxdh where hy.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and fxjhz.tjrq = $tjrq_ym$ ) t
